images.description: SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy NGC 3187, also showing NGC 3190 and NGC 3193, with which it comprises Arp 316; all three are members of Hickson Compact Group 44
SDSS image of spiral galaxy NGC 3187, also known (with NGC 3190 and NGC 3193) as Arp 316, and a member of Hickson Compact Group 44
